pkgmetadata.longdescription: # 42cc-pystyleflake8 plugins for 42 Coffee Cups style checks- 0.0.7flake8 version bump to 3.8.3- 0.0.6fixed flake8 warnings :)- 0.0.5fixed package layout declaration- 0.0.4fixed nosetests- 0.0.3moved code to a subfolder- 0.0.2Added MANIFEST.in- 0.0.1Tests should have docstringsTests for the module could be run via `nosetests` or `python setup.py nosetests`
